serviceCategories.name: Certificate Authority
serviceCategories.desc: Certificate authority or Certification authority (CA) is an organization/entity that issues digital certificates to help validate identities

serviceCategories.desc: Cloud services are infrastructure, platforms, or software that are hosted by third-party providers and made available to users through the internet

serviceCategories.name: Collaboration
serviceCategories.desc: Collaboration is the process of two or more people, entities or organizations working together to complete a task or achieve a goal

serviceCategories.name: Development
serviceCategories.desc: Development is a process that creates growth, progress, positive change or the addition of physical, economic, environmental, social and demographic components

serviceCategories.name: Electronic Signing
serviceCategories.desc: An electronic signature, or e-signature, is data that is logically associated with other data and which is used by the signatory to sign the associated data

serviceCategories.name: Email
serviceCategories.desc: Electronic mail (email or e-mail) is a method of exchanging messages (mail) between people using electronic devices

serviceCategories.name: Marketing and Analytics
serviceCategories.desc: Marketing and analytics is the study of data to evaluate the performance of a marketing activity

serviceCategories.name: B2B Marketing
serviceCategories.desc: B2B marketing is a collection of techniques for marketing to business buyers. Its goal is to improve lead quality, sales acceptance of leads and conversion rates

serviceCategories.name: Security
serviceCategories.desc: Security is protection from, or resilience against, potential harm caused by others, by restraining the freedom of others to act
